view.mapComponents

Class ShapeDrawer

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.mapComponents.ShapeDrawer

  • public class ShapeDrawer
extends java.lang.Object
    The ShapeDrawer class is used to draw shapes. It is built so that the shapes are drawn correctly on the screen, also in case of zooming in. Each MapComponentView relies on this class for visualization.
    Author:
    S.A.M. Janssen
